markdownRemark.html:
Dear Action Diary,

Today I made macaroons!

I love sweets and have always had a sweet tooth.
I don’t eat a heal concerning amount of sugar, but I do like to treat myself every now and again.
Sometimes a little too often lol.

Macaroons are a particular favorite of mine.
They are small and cute and delicious!
So I wanted to try my hand at making some.
I’ve also heard that makeing macaroons can be challening because of the attention to detail, abiding by all the steps, and measuring each ingredient carefully.

Challenge accepted!

I measured out each ingredient carefully, blended them at the right speeds and lengths, folded everything in correctly, baked it at the perfect temperature. And of course I messed up half way through so I had to start the whole batch all over again.

It tested my patience, my hand eye coordination, my perseverance, and my resilience to keep going and keep trying.
Even though it was challenging, annnnnnd got a little messy, I had a ton of fun.

The end results were deliciously rewarding.
